titleStmt.title: A fourth letter concerning the sacred Trinity in reply to what is entituled An answer to Dr. Wallis's three letters / by John Wallis ...
titleStmt.author: Wallis, John, 1616-1703.

notesStmt.note: Reply to Stephen Nye--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: pages stained and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
